author: Thomas Bardwell
title: Plague Inc. Developer Donating $250k to Fight Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Plague Inc. developer Ndemic Creations has donated $250,000 to WHO and CEPI to aid efforts to combat the global coronavirus pandemic. They're also releasing a new mode that lets players help stop virus spread. The post Plague Inc. Developer Donating $250k to …
content:
• Ndemic Creations has donated $250k to fight the coronavirus pandemic.
  • Both the WHO and CEPI will receive a portion of the funds to aid efforts to find a vaccine.
  • A mode is heading to Plague Inc. that will see players fight off a diseas… [+2108 chars]
